targets.expr: quantile(0.67, aptos_consensus_current_epoch_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

quantile(0.67, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name)(aptos_connections{network_id="Validator", role_type="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})) + 1

quantile(0.67, aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}) / 100000000

targets.rawSql:
with supply_per_epoch as (
select epoch, FLOOR(supply/1e8) total_supply, sum(voting_power/1e8) total_staking
from (
  select transaction_epoch, supply
  from `indexer_mainnet_gcp.coin_supply` 
  QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY transaction_epoch ORDER BY transaction_version DESC) = 1
) a
join `indexer_mainnet_gcp.epoch_validators` b
on a.transaction_epoch = b.epoch
group by 1,2 order by 1),

max_epoch as (select max(epoch) as epoch from supply_per_epoch)

select total_supply from supply_per_epoch a join max_epoch b on a.epoch = b.epoch

targets.expr: avg(irate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
max_over_time(irate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[30s])[$__range:30s])

rate(aptos_vm_txn_gas_usage_sum{kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1h]) / rate(aptos_vm_txn_gas_usage_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator"}[1h])
quantile(0.67, aptos_consensus_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

targets.rawSql: select entry_function_id_str, count(1) from `indexer_mainnet_gcp.user_transactions` group by 1 order by 2 desc LIMIT 10

targets.expr: (delta(aptos_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1d]) /  delta(aptos_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1d]) offset 1d) - 1

targets.rawSql:
select
  ds, count(*) as count
from
  (
    select
      *,
      DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") as ds
    from
      `indexer_mainnet_gcp.user_transactions`
  )
group by
  1
order by
  1 desc
limit
  10

panels.description: Almost accurate number of running public full nodes.

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(DISTINCT peer_id) as unique_connected_pfns FROM `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.custom_events` WHERE $__timeFilter(event_timestamp) and (role_type = "Unknown" or role_type = "PublicFullNode");

panels.title: Connected PFNs*

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, aptos_storage_latest_transaction_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

count(clamp_min(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"}, 0) > 50000) OR on() vector(0)

sort_desc(clamp_min(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",  role=~"validator", type="synced"}, 0) > 50000 )

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})*100

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})*100

aptos_committed_votes_in_window{chain_name=~"premainnet", namespace=~"telemetry-service", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"} + aptos_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"premainnet", namespace=~"telemetry-service", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"} == 0

panels.title: Connected but not Participating in Consensus

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_round{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role="validator"}[1m]))

quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_version{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"}[$__rate_interval]) - 2 * rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_round{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"}[$__rate_interval]))

quantile(0.67, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"})

quantile(0.67, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_100_rounds{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"})

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, cluster)(aptos_connections{network_id="Validator", role_type="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

aptos_state_sync_version{type="synced", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}

count(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"}  - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"telemetry-service",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"} > 30000)  OR on() vector(0)

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id)(aptos_connections{role="validator_fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

aptos_state_sync_version{type="synced", role="validator_fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id)(aptos_connections{role="public_fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

panels.description: Number of upstream validator peers a full node can proxy transactions up to

aptos_state_sync_version{type="synced", role="public_fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: aptos_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}

panels.title: Proposal failure count (in window)

panels.description: Participating in consensus in leader election window (either voted in last num_validators rounds, or proposed in last 10*num_validators rounds)

targets.expr: clamp_max(aptos_committed_votes_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"} + aptos_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}, 1)

panels.title: Participating in consensus

panels.description: The error rate of main loop.

panels.title: Error Rate

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_timeout_rounds_count{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])
aptos_consensus_current_round{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}

aptos_core_mempool_index_size{index="system_ttl", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}

quantile(0.5, rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m])/rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m]))

quantile(0.9, rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m])/rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m]))

quantile(0.99, rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m])/rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m]))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) by (le))

panels.description: The storage synchronizer throughput (versions per second).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator",type="synced"}[2m])

panels.title: Validator Syncing throughput

panels.description: The difference between the highest advertised version and the currently synced version.

targets.expr: clamp_min(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"}, 0)

panels.title: Validator Sync lag (behind highest known)

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state=~"idle_ms|iowait_ms"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator" , kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator" , kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state=~"guest_ms|guest_nice_ms"}[$__rate_interval]))
node_process_memory{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}

node_disk_total_space{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} - node_disk_available_space{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}

rate(node_linux_disk_num_reads{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(node_linux_disk_num_writes{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval])

rate(node_network_total_received{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(node_network_total_transmitted{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval])

irate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role=~"validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="iowait_ms"}[1m]) / 1000

panels.title: Validator CPU time waiting for IO
